text: The 2017–18 season will be Paksi SE's 12th competitive season, 12th consecutive season in the OTP Bank Liga and 65nd year in existence as a football club. == First team squad == http://paksifc.hu/pfc_plugins/adatbank/adatbank_osszeallitas.php?szezon=44&&csapat;=499 ==Transfers== ===Summer=== In: http://www.m4sport.hu/2017/06/30/hajdu-adam- marad-pakson/ Out: http://honvedfc.hu/hirek/laczko-zsolt- hosszabbitott/2017-06-30 http://www.nemzetisport.hu/labdarugo_nb_i/nb-i-nyari- atigazolasok-2017-2571123 ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== :Last updated on 9 December 2017. |- |colspan="14"|Youth players: |} ===Top scorers=== Includes all competitive matches.
